import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Layout from '../components/layout' import AlphaDisplayer from '../components/elements/alpha-displayer/AlphaDisplayer' import MakersEntry from '../components/elements/MakersEntry/MakersEntry' import RegionsEntry from '../components/elements/RegionsEntry/RegionsEntry' import { Cover1 } from '../components/graphics/imageCover/Cover' import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import ProductGrid from '../components/widgets/product/ProductGrid' import { parseCookies } from '../lib/parseCookies' import { getRequest } from '../services/api/get/getRequest' import { authenticate } from '../services/authentication/authentication' import { checkUser } from '../services/authentication/checkUser' const images = { cover01: "images/Articles/cover-01.jpg", cover02: "images/Articles/cover-02.jpg", cover1: "images/Articles/cover-1.jpg", cover2: "images/Articles/cover-2.jpg", cover3: "images/Articles/cover-3.jpg", cover4: "images/Articles/cover-4.jpg", cover5: "images/Articles/cover-5.jpg", cover6: "images/Articles/cover-6.jpg", cover7: "images/Articles/cover-7.jpg", cover8: "images/Articles/cover-8.jpg", cover9: "images/Articles/cover-9.jpg", } const Hello = (props) => { return ( MorMade
) } Hello.getInitialProps = async ({ req }) => { const cookies = parseCookies(req) console.log(cookies) const tags = await getRequest(process.env.domain + '/api/categories/').then((res) => { return (res) }) const user = await checkUser('check', cookies['csrftoken']) console.log(user) return { cookies: cookies, tags: tags, user: user } } export default Hello
